title: Update SkiaSharp package source URL in nuget.config
body: This pull request updates the NuGet package source for SkiaSharp previews in the test project configuration. The new source points to the official Azure DevOps feed instead of the previous preview endpoint. This ensures that package resolution uses the most current and supported location.

comments.author: github-actions[bot]
comments.body:
**Triage Summary**  

Labels will be applied to indicate the area of the issue (SkiaSharp) and the specific aspect concerning the backend integration related to the SkiaSharp package.

This issue does not appear to be a regression as it pertains to updating a package source, rather than indicating a failure of previously working functionality.

* The issue does not relate to a specific operating system, focusing instead on configuration updates in a package source.

<details>

Summary of the actions that will be performed:
